description: Given a text in natural language text with statements or arguments, a type of formal logic to use, a belief state to be parsed by Tweety, returns a query to be tested with a reasoning engine as a string formula to be parsed

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The natural language text to convert

parameters.name: logicType
parameters.description: The type of logic to use for conversion: available options are 'Propositional', 'FirstOrder' or 'Modal'

parameters.name: belief_set
parameters.description: The belief set on which the query will be run
